Detailed Description

Displays checked/unchecked states as a button with a "light" indicator and by default accompanied with the text "ON" or "OFF".

The following example demonstrates how to use the ToggleButton

 gaia::ui::ToggleButton* mpToggleButton = new gaia::ui::ToggleButton(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // set state of this button is checked
 mpToggleButton->setChecked(true);

Definition at line 41 of file ToggleButton.h.
